films.title: Cobra Kai
films.description: Cobra Kai is not a movie, but a television series that serves as a sequel to the 1984 film “The Karate Kid.” However, the story of Cobra Kai can be summarized as follows:

films.title: Absolution
films.description: The film tells the story of an aging gangster, played by Liam Neeson, who attempts to reconnect with his children and rectify the mistakes of his past. However, the criminal underworld he once operated in refuses to let him go, and he must navigate a complex web of loyalty and redemption.
A young man meets a farm girl who is actually a witch.

films.title: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians
films.description: The Martians kidnap Santa Claus because there is nobody on Mars to give their children presents.

films.title: Track Of The Moon Beast
films.description: A young man is transformed into a hideous 'moon beast' due to a meteor fragment lodged in his body.

films.title: The Skydivers
films.description: A woman seeks revenge on her former lover, who owns a skydiving business.

films.title: The Killer Shrews
films.description: On an isolated island, a small group of people are terrorized by giant voracious shrews in the midst of a hurricane.

films.title: Project Moon Base
films.description: A saboteur posing as a scientist strives to destroy the world's first space station.

films.title: The Giant Spider Invasion
films.description: Giant spiders from another dimension invade Wisconsin.

films.title: Catalina Caper
films.description: A group of swingin' teens take time out from having fun in the sun to try to foil a group of crooks searching for a stolen scroll.

films.title: Dont Move
films.description: Richard injects Iris with a paralytic drug, rendering her immobile, and takes her to his secluded cabin. As Iris’s body begins to shut down, she must use her wits and limited mobility to survive and escape from Richard’s clutches.

films.title: Cross
films.description: The Detective Alex Cross movie series is based on the fictional character Alex Cross, created by James Patterson. The series follows the story of Alex Cross, a detective and psychologist who solves crimes while dealing with personal struggles.

films.title: Smile
films.description: The film follows Dr. Rose Cotter (Sosie Bacon), a therapist who witnesses the bizarre and traumatic suicide of her patient, Laura Weaver. As Rose tries to process the incident, she begins to experience increasingly disturbing and unsettling visions, which lead her to believe she is being haunted by an uncanny entity.

films.title: Ruthless
films.description: The 2023 film “Ruthless” follows a high school coach, Harry, whose teenage daughter was murdered. He takes matters into his own hands by targeting a human trafficking ring that kidnapped one of his students, Catia. As Harry delves deeper into the world of human trafficking, he discovers the scope of the problem and embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue Catia and bring the traffickers to justice.

films.title: Average Joe
films.description: The Average Joe movie is based on a true story and follows the life of Joe Kennedy, a high school football coach who becomes a fighter for religious freedom.
